title: Trends in Testosterone Prescribing for Age-related Hypogonadism in Men With and Without Heart Disease.
abstract: This cohort study examines the trend in prescription testosterone use among male Medicare beneficiaries with and without coronary artery disease aged 50 years or older.

authors.name: Nancy E Morden
